raw: * Very basic dialog manager. Displays a native alert or confirm dialog if
* the application is running in a PhoneGap environment. For debugging in a browser
* it displays the browser alert or confirm dialog. In the near
* future this should be replaced by dialog widgets.
* *Example*
* Here is a little example of how to use the widget.
* <pre class='javascript'>
*    var buttons = [];
*    buttons.push(qx.locale.Manager.tr("OK"));
*    buttons.push(qx.locale.Manager.tr("Cancel"));
*    var title = "Delete item";
*    var text = "Do you want to delete the item?"
*    qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Manager.getInstance().confirm(title, text, function(index) {
*      if (index==1) {
*        // delete the item
*    }, this, buttons);
*
* This example displays a confirm dialog and defines a button click handler.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Very basic dialog manager. Displays a native alert or confirm dialog if the application is running in a PhoneGap environment. For debugging in a browser it displays the browser alert or confirm dialog. In the near future this should be replaced by dialog widgets. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

    var buttons = [];
    buttons.push(qx.locale.Manager.tr("OK"));
    buttons.push(qx.locale.Manager.tr("Cancel"));
    var title = "Delete item";
    var text = "Do you want to delete the item?"
    qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Manager.getInstance().confirm(title, text, function(index) {
      if (index==1) {

      }
    }, this, buttons);

This example displays a confirm dialog and defines a button click handler.

raw: * Displays an alert box. When the application is running in a PhoneGap
* environment, a native alert box is shown. When debugging in a browser, a
* browser alert is shown.
* @param title {String} The title of the alert box
* @param text {String} The text to display in the alert box
* @param handler {Function} The handler to call when the OK button
*     was pressed
* @param scope {Object} The scope of the handler
* @param button {String} The button title
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup|Object} a reference to an alert dialog
* instance. An Object, if environment is
* phonegap, or a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup}
*          if not.
* @lint ignoreDeprecated(alert)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Displays an alert box. When the application is running in a PhoneGap environment, a native alert box is shown. When debugging in a browser, a browser alert is shown.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: title {String} The title of the alert box
@param.description: The title of the alert box

@param.name: @param
@param.body: text {String} The text to display in the alert box
@param.description: The text to display in the alert box

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} The handler to call when the OK button was pressed
@param.description: The handler to call when the OK button was pressed

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scope {Object} The scope of the handler
@param.description: The scope of the handler

@param.name: @param
@param.body: button {String} The button title
@param.description: The button title

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup|Object} a reference to an alert dialog instance. An Object, if environment is phonegap, or a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup} if not.
@return.description: a reference to an alert dialog instance. An Object, if environment is phonegap, or a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup} if not.

raw: * Displays a confirm box. When the application is running in a PhoneGap
* environment, a native confirm box is shown. When debugging in a browser, a
* browser confirm is shown.
* @param title {String} The title of the confirm box
* @param text {String} The text to display in the confirm box
* @param handler {Function} The handler to call when the OK button
* was pressed. The first parameter of the function is the index
*     of the pressed button, starting from 0.
* @param scope {Object} The scope of the handler
* @param buttons {String[]} Each text entry of the array represents a button and
*     its title
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup} The dialog widget
* @lint ignoreDeprecated(confirm)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Displays a confirm box. When the application is running in a PhoneGap environment, a native confirm box is shown. When debugging in a browser, a browser confirm is shown.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: title {String} The title of the confirm box
@param.description: The title of the confirm box

@param.name: @param
@param.body: text {String} The text to display in the confirm box
@param.description: The text to display in the confirm box

@param.name: @param
@param.body: handler {Function} The handler to call when the OK button was pressed. The first parameter of the function is the index of the pressed button, starting from 0.
@param.description: The handler to call when the OK button was pressed. The first parameter of the function is the index of the pressed button, starting from 0.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scope {Object} The scope of the handler
@param.description: The scope of the handler

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
buttons {String[]} Each text entry of the array represents a button and
     its title
@param.description:
Each text entry of the array represents a button and
     its title

raw: * Shows a dialog widget.

* @param buttons {String[]} Each text entry of the array represents a button and
*     its title
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup} The dialog widget
* @param dialogType {Integer} One of the static dialog types.
